scripts.start: LOCAL_IP=$(echo $(ifconfig | grep 'inet ' | grep -v '127.0.0.1' | awk '{print $2}' | head -n 1)) meteor run --settings settings.json
scripts.test: MOCHA_TIMEOUT=10000 LOCAL_IP=$(echo $(ifconfig | grep 'inet ' | grep -v '127.0.0.1' | awk '{print $2}' | head -n 1)) meteor test --once --driver-package meteortesting:mocha
scripts.test:watch: MOCHA_TIMEOUT=100000 LOCAL_IP=$(echo $(ifconfig | grep 'inet ' | grep -v '127.0.0.1' | awk '{print $2}' | head -n 1)) meteor test --driver-package meteortesting:mocha
scripts.lint:format: npm run lint:fix && npm run format
